name: Rates
tagline: Fortran 95 modules for rate constants with relavance in atmospheric chemistry
body:
### Welcome to Rates developer web page.

### How to cite
Each module has is own citation which are the original papers from each the fortran 95 modules are created. It should also use the citation:

P. J. S. B. Caridade, "RATES: Fortran 95 modules for rate constants with relavance in atmospheric chemistry" (2013) available from [https://github.com/pcaridade/rates.git](https://github.com/pcaridade/rates.git)   

### Support or Contact
Pedro Caridade: pedrojcaridade at gmail.com, or leave a message in Github
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
